hero.title: A World First in B2B Prospecting
hero.mainText: Propel your marketing and prospecting into a new dimension with our revolutionary AI! Instantly identify qualified leads and get a 360Â° view: strengths to leverage, weaknesses to overcome, opportunities to seize. Transform each prospect into success with powerful insights and an unbeatable advantage. Ready to dominate your market? Step up to the next level now!

features.title: Key Features
features.description: Powerful tools to optimize your sales prospecting

scoring.title: Intelligent Lead Scoring
scoring.description: Our AI analyzes and assigns a score from 1 to 10 to each lead based on their relevance to your business.

analysis.title: In-depth Analysis
analysis.description: Get a detailed view of the strengths and weaknesses of each prospect company.

database.title: Centralized Database
database.description: All your data is centralized and easily accessible in an intuitive dashboard.

collaboration.title: Collaborative Management
collaboration.description: Share and collaborate effectively with your sales team.

pricing.title: Plans Tailored to Your Needs
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best matches your prospecting goals

contact.title: Need a Custom Solution?
contact.description: Are you a business with specific needs? We can adapt our solution to your particular requirements.
contact.team: Our team is here to understand your needs and propose a tailored solution.
